body.p: After the Solution Admin Host is installed:

ol.li: Copy the ISO of the Red Hat Enterprise Server 7 installation DVD to the /store/data/iso directory. This ISO is used to install the Foreman virtual machine.
To set up the Foreman virtual machine, follow the Dell Solution Admin Foreman Virtual Machine Deployment Guide.
To set up the Ceph virtual machine, follow the Dell Solution Admin Ceph Virtual Machine Deployment Guide.
